title: Masaka-dou e Irasshai
original_name: マサカ堂へいらっしゃい
sinopse:
Passionate bird shop owner Masaka Toru meets foreign exchange student Fon-kun, who now makes regular visits to the shop. What is Masaka to do when he receives an unexpected confession from his regular? And what is Fon-kun to do with a parakeet as his love rival?

(Source: Yaoi Is Life)
